reviews.review_msg: This class has been a nightmare! I have tried to get in touch with this professor to learn more about different materials. She takes a very long time to respond. She does not attend lecture. There have been 5 cancelled classes. We have literally only had 2 or 3 classes since the beginning of the semester. Avoid this prof at all costs.

By far the worst professor I have ever had. Its been 6 weeks since the semester started and we've only had 2 classes so far. She expects us to write a midterm this week and we literally have nothing to study. Bases her teachings purely on opinion from herself and students. Content is extremely vague and very ambiguous. Have learnt nothing so far.

Expects a lot of engaged discussion in class.  Don't go if you haven't done the readings, but makes for a more interesting class if you have.  Fair marker, makes very clear her expectations, and is very helpful if you have questions.  She only comes across condescending if you have not done the required work.

She had a high level of interest in the topics and the course was very well structured. Her lecture style involved a lot of small group work that would transition into full class discussions/debates. She expected everyone to be prepared for class and to read all the readings beforehand. I would definitely take another course with this prof.
Great professor to get you talking. And, sorry ladies, he isn't single.
My Grandma can lecture better than this so-called Teacher.

Would not recommend any Poli Sci students taking Cara Camcastle. Unclear instructions for how she wants things done, feels like a first year science course. Be ready to regurgitate useless information on tests and she deducts marks for personal beliefs.
